Attribute.Name: businessComponent
Attribute.Description: Used by third party packages to associate this WWD to a BC

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Level Name.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Level Description.

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Literal to appear in the Form's caption (description is the default).

Attribute.Name: variables
Attribute.Description: Event's Variables

Attribute.Name: dataSelector
Attribute.Description: Data Selector for the list.

Attribute.Name: dataSelectorParameters
Attribute.Description: Parameters for the Data Selector (optional).

Attribute.Name: autoRefreshTime
Attribute.Description: Automatic refresh in seconds (0 = off)

Attribute.Name: events
Attribute.Description: Action's event source.

Attribute.Name: showAds
Attribute.Description: Show ads in this panel.

Attribute.Name: adsPosition
Attribute.Description: Ads position in this panel.

Attribute.Name: share
Attribute.Description: Attribute or Variable used for sharing in the panel.

Attribute.Name: deepLinkName
Attribute.Description: String to find before the '?' or at the end if there isn't

Attribute.Name: deepLinkName
Attribute.Description: String to find before the '?' or at the end if there isn't

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Literal to appear inside the Section.

Attribute.Name: code
Attribute.Description: Internal name. Must be unique.

Attribute.Name: linkClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the section when used as link.

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Image to be shown for the section.

Attribute.Name: unselectedImage
Attribute.Description: Image to be shown for the section when not selected

Attribute.Name: Type
Attribute.Description: Layout type.

Attribute.Name: Orientation
Attribute.Description: Layout orientation.

Attribute.Name: Platform
Attribute.Description: Platform this layout applies to (empty for all platforms).

Attribute.Name: columnsStyle
Attribute.ApplyIf: self::*[(@tableType = 'Tabular' and ancestor::layout/parent::*/@PanelType = 'SD') or (@tableType = 'SmartTable' and ancestor::layout/parent::*/@PanelType = 'Web')]

Attribute.Name: rowsStyle
Attribute.ApplyIf: self::*[(@tableType = 'Tabular' and ancestor::layout/parent::*/@PanelType = 'SD') or (@tableType = 'SmartTable' and ancestor::layout/parent::*/@PanelType = 'Web')]

Attribute.Name: overflowBehavior
Attribute.Description: Determines whether a control has scroll or not
Attribute.ApplyIf: self::*[@tableType = 'Tabular' and @AutoGrow = 'False' and (not(parent::cell) or parent::cell/parent::row/parent::table/@tableType != 'Flex') and ancestor::layout/parent::*/@PanelType = 'SD']

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the attribute.

Attribute.Name: background
Attribute.Description: Background image for the table

Attribute.Name: formClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the Form.

Attribute.Name: enableHeaderRowPattern
Attribute.Description: Enable Header Row Pattern.

Attribute.Name: headerRowApplicationBarsClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for application bars when use Header Row Pattern.

Attribute.Name: expandBounds
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds of the control's content & background, background only or none.

Attribute.Name: expandLimit
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds Limit.

Attribute.Name: expandDirection
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds Directions.

Attribute.Name: flexDirection
Attribute.Description: This attribute determines the direction of the main axis (and the cross axis, perpendicular to the main axis). The direction children items are placed inside the Flexbox layout.

Attribute.Name: flexWrap
Attribute.Description: This attribute controls whether the flex container is single-line or multi-line, and the direction of the cross axis.

Attribute.Name: justifyContent
Attribute.Description: This attribute controls the alignment along the main axis.

Attribute.Name: alignItems
Attribute.Description: This attribute controls the alignment along the cross axis.

Attribute.Name: alignContent
Attribute.Description: This attribute controls the alignment of the flex lines in the flex container.

Attribute.Name: adjustContainerSize
Attribute.Description: This attribute controls whether the flex container adjusts it's size with respect to it's children.

Attribute.Name: ColumnsGap
Attribute.Description: Determines the gap between columns.

Attribute.Name: RowsGap
Attribute.Description: Determines the gap between rows.

Attribute.Name: isStencil
Attribute.Description: This attribute determines if the table should behave as a Stencil during edition.

Attribute.Name: ignoreInDevelopment
Attribute.Description: This attribute contains the name of the controls to ignore in development.

Attribute.Name: stencilName
Attribute.Description: This attribute contains the name of an external Stencil.

Attribute.Name: stencilRef
Attribute.Description: This attribute references an external Stencil.

Attribute.Name: stencilCache
Attribute.Description: This attribute contains the cached layout of the Stencil when last used.

Attribute.Name: rowHeightWeb
Attribute.Description: Minimum height of the row.

Attribute.Name: rowClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the row.

Attribute.Name: cellClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the cell.

Attribute.Name: rowSpan
Attribute.Description: Rows spanned by the control.

Attribute.Name: colSpan
Attribute.Description: Columns spanned by the control.

Attribute.Name: hAlign
Attribute.Description: Horizontal alignment for the content of the layout element.

Attribute.Name: vAlign
Attribute.Description: Vertical alignment for the content of the layout element.

Attribute.Name: flexGrow
Attribute.Description: This attribute determines how much this child will grow if positive free space is distributed relative to the rest of other flex items included in the same flex line. If a flex item has a positive Flex Grow value, the item will take up the remaining space in the flex line. If multiple flex items in the same flex line have positive Flex Grow values, the remaining free space is distributed depending on the proportion of their declared Flex Grow value.

Attribute.Name: flexShrink
Attribute.Description: This attribute determines how much this child will shrink if negative free space is distributed relative to the rest of other flex items included in the same flex line.

Attribute.Name: alignSelf
Attribute.Description: This attribute determines the alignment along the cross axis (perpendicular to the main axis). The alignment in the same direction can be determined by the Align Items in the parent, but if this is set to other than auto, the cross axis alignment is overridden for this child.

Attribute.Name: flexWidth
Attribute.Description: This attribute determines the width in dips of the control.

Attribute.Name: flexHeight
Attribute.Description: This attribute determines the height in dips of the control.

Attribute.Name: minWidth
Attribute.Description: This attribute impose minimum width constraint in dips. The control won't be shrank less than the value of these attributes (varies based on the Flex Direction attribute as to which attribute imposes the size constraint along the main axis) regardless of the Flex Shrink attribute.

Attribute.Name: minHeight
Attribute.Description: This attribute impose minimum height constraint in dips. The control won't be shrank less than the value of these attributes (varies based on the Flex Direction attribute as to which attribute imposes the size constraint along the main axis) regardless of the Flex Shrink attribute.

Attribute.Name: maxWidth
Attribute.Description: This attribute impose maximum width constraint in dips. The control won't be expanded more than the value of these attributes (varies based on the Flex Direction attribute as to which attribute imposes the size constraint along the main axis) regardless of the Flex Grow attribute.

Attribute.Name: maxHeight
Attribute.Description: This attribute impose maximum height constraint in dips. The control won't be expanded more than the value of these attributes (varies based on the Flex Direction attribute as to which attribute imposes the size constraint along the main axis) regardless of the Flex Grow attribute.

Attribute.Name: ControlType
Attribute.Description: Custom control for display.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the grid.

Attribute.Name: collection
Attribute.Description: Level of the SDT/BC used for this grid.

Attribute.Name: rows
Attribute.Description: Number of rows in lists per page.

Attribute.Name: defaultAction
Attribute.Description: Default event to execute when selecting a list item. If none is specified and a detail is defined for this level, it will be used.

Attribute.Name: defaultActionObject
Attribute.Description: Object used for default action

Attribute.Name: selectionType
Attribute.Type: enum{Platform Default;No selection;Keep selection while executing;Keep until new selection}

Attribute.Name: showSelector
Attribute.Description: Always = Show the selector if there is at least one event with a 'for each selected line' over this Grid, On Action = Show the selector when an event with a 'for each selected line' over this Grid is executed.

Attribute.Name: selectionFlag
Attribute.Description: Attribute or Variable with the selection state

Attribute.Name: selectionFlagFieldSpecifier
Attribute.Description: Member of the SDT/BC for Selection Flag.

Attribute.Name: dataSelector
Attribute.Description: Data Selector for the list.

Attribute.Name: dataSelectorParameters
Attribute.Description: Parameters for the Data Selector (optional).

Attribute.Name: emptyDataSetBackground
Attribute.Description: Image to be shown when there isn't any data available.

Attribute.Name: emptyDataSetBackgroundClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for Empty Grid Background Image.

Attribute.Name: emptyDataSetText
Attribute.Description: Text to be shown when there isn't any data available.

Attribute.Name: emptyDataSetTextClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for Empty Grid Text.

Attribute.Name: pullToRefresh
Attribute.Description: Allow to refresh grid data with pull to refresh gesture.

Attribute.Name: inverseLoad
Attribute.Description: When set to true, the grid items will be loaded in inverse order, with the first element at the bottom and de 'Loading' message at the top.

Attribute.Name: expandBounds
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds of the control's content & background, background only or none.

Attribute.Name: expandLimit
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds Limit.

Attribute.Name: expandDirection
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds Directions.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the grid.

Attribute.Name: collection
Attribute.Description: Level of the SDT/BC used for this grid.

Attribute.Name: attribute
Attribute.Description: Associated attribute or Variable

Attribute.Name: fieldSpecifier
Attribute.Description: Member of the SDT/BC.

Attribute.Name: titleExp
Attribute.Description: Title for the column

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the column.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the tab.

Attribute.Name: historyManagement
Attribute.Description: True to enable automatic history management. When enabled, every time a user clicks on a tab, a new entry is added to the browser History. When the user presses the browser's back button, the previous tab is activated, and the TabChange event is fired.

Attribute.Name: expandBounds
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds of the control's content & background, background only or none.

Attribute.Name: expandLimit
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds Limit.

Attribute.Name: expandDirection
Attribute.Description: Expand Bounds Directions.

Attribute.Name: selClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the selected tabpage.

Attribute.Name: itemClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the unselected tabpage.

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Tab caption.

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Image for this tab page selector

Attribute.Name: unselectedImage
Attribute.Description: Image for this tab page selector when not selected

Attribute.Name: imagePosition
Attribute.Type: enum{Platform Default;Above Text;Below Text;Before Text;After Text;Behind Text}
Attribute.Description: Specify the relative location of the image to the text.

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Group caption.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the group.

Attribute.Name: content
Attribute.Description: Component reference.

Attribute.Name: parameters
Attribute.Description: Section parameters (optional).

Attribute.Name: display
Attribute.Description: Display style (shown in the detail, or linked from detail).

Attribute.Name: showSectionTitle
Attribute.Description: Show section title.

Attribute.Name: display
Attribute.Description: Display style (as a separate tab, shown in the detail, or linked from detail).

Attribute.Name: showSectionTitle
Attribute.Description: Show section title.

Attribute.Name: tabSectionClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for section tab control.

Attribute.Name: parameters
Attribute.Description: Component parameters

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the component.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the ErrorViewer.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the EmbeddedPage.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the HyperLink.

Attribute.Name: attribute
Attribute.Description: Associated attribute or Variable

Attribute.Name: fieldSpecifier
Attribute.Description: Member of the SDT/BC.

Attribute.Name: labelPosition
Attribute.Description: Visualization position of the associated label.

Attribute.Name: labelWidth
Attribute.Description: Width of the associated label.

Attribute.Name: labelCaption
Attribute.Description: Caption for the associated label.

Attribute.Name: readonly
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the control is readonly

Attribute.Name: autolink
Attribute.Description: Automatically generate links to other pattern instances for description attributes and supertypes.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the attribute.

Attribute.Name: inviteMessage
Attribute.Description: Text to invite the user to interact with the control

Attribute.Name: timeInviteMessage
Attribute.Description: Text to invite the user to interact with the control in the time field

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the Section.

Attribute.Name: width
Attribute.Description: Width for control associated to this button

Attribute.Name: height
Attribute.Description: Height for control associated to this button

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Caption (text shown in the UI).

Attribute.Name: ControlType
Attribute.Description: User control associated to this button

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the button (if no class is specified, the one set in the configuration file will be used).

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Image to be shown for the button.

Attribute.Name: disabledImage
Attribute.Description: Image to appear in the grid when the button is not enabled (to make the button invisible, use a transparent image).

Attribute.Name: imagePosition
Attribute.Type: enum{Above Text;Below Text;Before Text;After Text;Behind Text}
Attribute.Description: Specify the relative location of the image to the text.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the image.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for the attribute.

Attribute.Name: ControlType
Attribute.Description: User control associated to this textblock

Attribute.Name: showApplicationBars
Attribute.Description: Show application bars.

Attribute.Name: applicationBarsClass
Attribute.Description: Theme class for application bars.

Attribute.Name: class
Attribute.Description: Theme class for action group.

Attribute.Name: controlWebType
Attribute.Description: Indicates if the group will be rendered as a ToolBar or a Menu.

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Caption (text shown in the UI).

Attribute.Name: image
Attribute.Description: Image to be shown for the group.
Attribute.ApplyIf: self::*[not(parent::actionGroups) and ancestor::layout/parent::*/@PanelType = 'SD' or parent::actionGroups and ancestor::layout/parent::*/@PanelType = 'Web']

Attribute.Name: disabledImage
Attribute.Description: Image to appear in the grid when the button is not enabled (to make the button invisible, use a transparent image).

Attribute.Name: position
Attribute.Description: Select 'Default' to render the Menu where it was included. Select 'Fixed Top' to render the Menu fixed to the top of the page. Select 'Fixed Bottom' to render it fixed to the bottom of the page.

Attribute.Name: hAlign
Attribute.Description: Horizontal alignment for the content of the layout element.

Attribute.Name: vAlign
Attribute.Description: Vertical alignment for the content of the layout element.

Attribute.Name: inviteMessage
Attribute.Description: Text to invite the user to interact with the object

Attribute.Name: autoRefreshTime
Attribute.Description: Automatic refresh in seconds (0 = off)

Attribute.Name: ordersProperty
Attribute.Description: Orders and Break by.

Attribute.Name: ordersWebProperty
Attribute.Description: Grid orders.

Attribute.Name: searchProperty
Attribute.Description: Search and Advanced Search.

Attribute.Name: conditions
Attribute.Description: Grid conditions.

Attribute.Name: basetrn
Attribute.Description: Grid base trn

Attribute.Name: unique
Attribute.Description: Grid unique.

Attribute.Name: caption
Attribute.Description: Search caption

Attribute.Name: optionForIndividualFields
Attribute.Description: Include an option to select which of the search fields is used in the search (instead of all of them).

Attribute.Name: alwaysVisible
Attribute.Description: Search field always visible or only on demand.

Attribute.Name: filterOperator
Attribute.Description: Search type.

Attribute.Name: caseSensitive
Attribute.Description: Search is case sensitive.

Attribute.Name: breakBy
Attribute.Description: Break by behavior while searching.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Search caption.

Attribute.Name: displayName
Attribute.Description: Title of filter group for this grid

Attribute.Name: attribute
Attribute.Description: Attribute/Variable to filter for.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: Filter caption.

Attribute.Name: type
Attribute.Description: Filter type

Attribute.Name: expression
Attribute.Description: Custom condition for the filter.

Attribute.Name: default
Attribute.Description: Default value. Must be an expression of the same type of the attribute/variable.

Attribute.Name: defaultBeginRange
Attribute.Description: Default value for the starting point of the range. Must be an expression of the same type of the attribute/variable.

Attribute.Name: defaultEndRange
Attribute.Description: Default value for the ending point of the range. Must be an expression of the same type of the attribute/variable.

Attribute.Name: allValue
Attribute.Description: Add an 'all' option in ComboBox. (Use only when the attribute is a ComboBox).

Attribute.Name: name
Attribute.Description: Name of the Order, for user selection.

Attribute.Name: GroupBy
Attribute.Description: Group items in sections, based on the attributes of the order.

Attribute.Name: EnableAlphaIndexer
Attribute.Description: Enable use Alpha Indexer in the list for the first attribute of this order.

Attribute.Name: groupByUpTo
Attribute.Description: Last attribute/variable to group by (if none is specified, all the order attributes will be used). Set it to specify aditional order attributes that do not participate in grouping.

Attribute.Name: descriptionAttribute
Attribute.Description: Specify the attribute/variable value to be shown on the UI for this Group

Attribute.Name: ascending
Attribute.Description: Ascending Order.

Attribute.Name: descriptionAttribute
Attribute.Description: Specify the attribute/variable value to be shown on the UI for this Group
